pages.privacy-policy: Privacy Policy - BlissfulBay Hotel Resort BlissfulBay HOME ABOUT US Casino Contact Privacy Policy At BlissfulBay Hotel Resort, we are committed to protecting your privacy. This Privacy Policy outlines how we collect, use, and safeguard your personal information. By using our website, you agree to the terms of this policy. Information We Collect We collect various types of information to provide and improve our services: Personal Identification Information (such as name, email address, phone number, etc.) when you make a reservation, subscribe to our newsletter, or fill out a contact form. Payment Information (such as credit card details) to process your bookings and transactions securely. Usage Data (such as IP address, browser type, pages visited, etc.) to analyze how our website is used and improve user experience. How We Protect Your Information We implement a variety of security measures to ensure the safety of your personal information: We use encryption technologies to protect sensitive data during transmission. We regularly update our systems and conduct security audits to prevent unauthorized access. We restrict access to personal information to authorized personnel only. Sharing Your Information We do not sell, trade, or otherwise transfer your personal information to outside parties, except as necessary to provide our services or comply with the law: Service Providers: We may share your information with trusted third-party service providers to assist in operating our website, conducting business, or servicing you. Legal Compliance: We may disclose your information to comply with legal obligations, enforce our site policies, or protect our rights, property, or safety. Your Rights You have the right to access, update, or delete your personal information. If you wish to exercise these rights, please contact us using the information provided below. BlissfulBay uses cookies to enhance your experience on our serene retreat website. Accept or Decline. pages.terms-conditions: Terms and Conditions - BlissfulBay Hotel Resort BlissfulBay HOME ABOUT US Casino Contact Terms and Conditions Welcome to BlissfulBay Hotel Resort. These terms and conditions outline the rules and regulations for the use of our website and services. By accessing or using our website, you agree to comply with and be bound by these terms. If you do not agree with any part of these terms, please do not use our website. Use of the Website By accessing our website, you warrant and represent that you are at least 18 years old and have the legal authority to enter into this agreement. You agree to use the website in accordance with these terms and all applicable laws and regulations. Reservations and Payments All reservations are subject to availability and confirmation. We reserve the right to refuse any reservation at our discretion. Payment must be made in full at the time of booking unless otherwise stated. We accept various payment methods, including credit cards and bank transfers. Prices are subject to change without notice. However, once a booking is confirmed, the price is guaranteed. Cancellations and Refunds Cancellations must be made in accordance with our cancellation policy, which will be provided at the time of booking. Refunds, if applicable, will be processed within a reasonable timeframe. Any applicable fees may be deducted from the refund amount. Guest Conduct Guests are expected to conduct themselves in a respectful and lawful manner during their stay. We reserve the right to terminate a guest's stay without refund if they engage in disruptive, dangerous, or illegal behavior. Liability We are not liable for any loss, damage, or injury suffered by guests during their stay, except where such loss, damage, or injury is due to our negligence or willful misconduct. Guests are responsible for their personal belongings. We do not accept liability for loss or theft of personal items. In the event of unforeseen circumstances, including but not limited to natural disasters, strikes, or other events beyond our control, we reserve the right to cancel reservations without liability. Privacy Your use of our website and services is also governed by our Privacy Policy. Please review our Privacy Policy for more information on how we collect, use, and protect your personal information. Changes to Terms We reserve the right to modify these terms and conditions at any time. Any changes will be posted on this page, and the effective date will be updated accordingly. Your continued use of our website and services after any changes constitutes your acceptance of the new terms. BlissfulBay uses cookies to enhance your experience on our serene retreat website. Accept or Decline. Accept Decline BlissfulBay Experience blissful stays and exceptional hospitality at BlissfulBay hotel resort.
